You're engaged? Yay! Where do you start? If you are not sure then we would love to help. 

Marby's Brides is your helping hand through your planning process from engagement to honeymoon send off.  Whether you are trying to stay on budget, need help handling all your vendors to setting up your DIY centerpieces, we provide a variety of services. Marby's Brides has worked with events starting here in San Antonio to the Texas Hill country and all the way to El Paso, Texas. 

We would love to set up a time to chat about your special day. Shoot us a message. :)

"Marby was awesome she ensured that everything was taken care of and I was stress free the day of my wedding. Whenever I had a question leading up to the big day she was there with a quick response. When I needed help finding an officiant she was quick to refer one to me. She did great setting up the extra decorations that I had as well as making sure I had everything I needed and that I was doing fine through my entire event. I couldn't had done it without her."                Jackie R.

"I contacted marby a few months before my big day. I had the majority of my wedding planned but really wanted someone help me wrap things up. She helped me find my last few vendors and gave me some great options within my price point. Leading up to the big day she had everything handled and all my vendors confirmed!! At Marriott Plaza San Antonio, we offer unique settings for any size gathering. From a romantic ceremony in our Victorian Gazebo, the courtyard of our restored 1850 Schoolhouse to an intimate event in a 19th Century Victorial cottage.

You will experience San Antonio’s romantic and unique hotel for that special day you’ll remember forever.

Let our wedding specialist arrange every detail for you and help you create the wedding of your dreams.

About This Venue
 
Reserve our elegant courtyard for your San Antonio wedding reception and enjoy the tranquil space.

  • Up to 350 guests can be accommodated in our wedding courtyard for outdoor receptions and parties.

  • Beautiful century-old oak trees surround our 6,300-square-foot San Antonio wedding venue.

  • Our gazebo garden's lush lawn is highlighted by colorful flowers, magnolia trees and greenery.

  • Victoria's Cottage features three rooms and can accommodate up to 70 people for various events.

  • The elegant Arciniega  House is perfect for intimate meetings and receptions for up to 40 people.


Contact us today at (210) 353-8028 to learn more about the many venues of Marriott Plaza San Antonio.

For the love of artistry, beauty, & film.  

I'm a film photographer, an artist, and most importantly, a wife and a mom. I have a passion for capturing emotion as it happens and turning those moments into beautiful, timeless photographs. I approach every shoot differently, they are each treated like a unique project all their own. I make it my personal goal to build a relationship with everyone I photograph. It's so important to me to know who they are, their values, where they came from, and their passions in life so that the photographs I take show their unique individual qualities. To be able to take what the client has, what they tell me, and turn it all into beautiful images that tell a story and that they can pass down to their children one day. Because to me, those are the photographs that are priceless!

I am Award Winning and Nationally Recognized Film photographer specializing in fine art Portraiture and Weddings.

Plan for your marriage! 

Understanding your partner is important. Those who engage in premarital counseling are much more likely to have a long and happy marriage. 

Priscilla Rodriguez with Modern Wellness Counseling can help you better understand your partner and give you two an even greater chance at a successful marriage. You will learn how to manage conflict constructively, how to maintain intimacy and satisfaction, and learn how to build a solid foundation of friendship and meaning. 

There are 2 different ways to receive premarital counseling! 
You can take a class online on your own schedule or in person and have the sessions tailored to your relationship! 

Regardless of the method, investing in your marriage is key! 

You will receive a Twogether in Texas certificate upon completion and be able to save $60 on your marriage license and waive the 72 hour waiting period.

Nelda Etheredge, Harpist, has been performing and teaching in the San Antonio area since 1982. Nelda provides romantic wedding, reception or party music -- a flutist or violinist are also available. Wedding packages include prelude music (to begins twenty minutes prior to ceremony) plus processional and recessional music. Select from sacred, classical, popular, renaissance or Celtic music. Prices begin at $200.

In addition to harp services, Nelda can provide other musicians, as well, including DJ’s, pianists and vocalists. Nelda works with professional musicians from across south Texas and places them with brides for their wedding day.

Nelda Etheredge is also available to teach harp lessons as well as music theory to students who are eager to share the harp experience.

You will be surrounded by the stunning Texas Hill Country views and our magnificent vineyard, making it the most memorable experience as you celebrate your love with family and friends in this relaxed, friendly atmosphere that supports you with their southern hospitality. 

We want to make sure your special event is wonderful and full of celebration so whether you are looking to host a wedding, family gathering, corporate event, or other special occasion,  the Oak Valley Vineyards Restaurant is prepared to make your time with us the best that it can be!

Hi, I’m Deborah Gonzales, proud owner of Oakleaf Florist for more than 25 years.  

Since 1982 we have had the reputation for creating beautiful floral designs that keeps our customers coming back with praise and recommendations. As a locally-owned, small business we understand the importance extraordinary arrangements can make.

Our dedication and passion for weddings shows through our work. Whether your plans call for a simple ceremony or a grand gala, with our experience and personal touch you’re sure to love your flowers.  We will assist you from start to finish. We’ll take the time to listen and design the wedding of your dreams. Whether the sky’s the limit or you have a set budget, we would love to provide you with beautiful flowers.

We take pride in our reputation to provide exceptional customer service, so whether you prefer a consultation through phone calls, e-mails or in person, we are here for you. We are here to give you as much or as little information as you prefer. Tell us what is most important—the look, the color, the price or all of the above—and we’ll make it work for you.

We have a wide variety of rental items available for your convenience.

  • Hurricanes, candles & mirrors
  • Tower, pilsner, square & cylinder vases 
  • Candelabras, urns & pedestals

We have been creating beautiful weddings for more than 25 years.

We will not be the least expensive because we only buy the best.

We will not be the most expensive because we maintain low overhead.

With our experience and reputation you can expect the best value for your money while providing you with the service you can expect and deserve.

Please call Oakleaf Florist at 210-653-8180. We look forward to hearing from you.

Olympia Hills Golf and Event Center offers a spectacular setting for your celebration. The 8,000 square foot clubhouse and event center rests some 100 feet above the golf course offering a picturesque view of the course and surroundings.  168 acres of pristine views present fabulous photo opportunities and the fully renovated banquet room is sure to impress!  Updates include new chandeliers, chiavari chairs, neutral carpeting and walls.  Outdoors, a new ceremony arch is available for ceremonies.  

The banquet space accommodates up to 200 guests and 200 for outdoor ceremonies.  Complete on-site professional catering, a spacious foyer ideal for sign-ins, ample parking and a location just minutes from downtown, make Olympia Hills a favorite among brides. Rooms can even be made smaller for more intimate occasions such as rehearsal dinners, showers, bridal luncheons or the day-after brunch.

Olympia Hills is ready to make your day stress free and elegant.

column4:
Paloma Blanca have two unique and beautiful dining rooms that are perfect for any occasion - engagement parties, wedding showers, rehearsal dinners, receptions - and even the ceremony itself!
 

  • Salón la Fuente (“The Fountain Room”)
    This room boasts a detailed brick-and-copper fountain on the northern wall, upon which a display of candles can be scattered. Salón la Fuente will comfortably accommodate up to 55 seated guests, or up to 75 guests for a reception-style event. Should your number of guests exceed this amount, we can utilize the adjoining dining room as well, effectively doubling the potential occupancy to 120 seated (100 inside and 20 on patio/150 reception). The patio area adjacent to Salón la Fuente, featuring a flowing fountain and beautiful landscape, is ideal for an initial cocktail/social time, or for additional dining.

  •  Salón el Jardín (“The Garden Room”)
    Located adjacent to the bar, Salón Jardin offers the most privacy. It has high ceilings, beautiful slate wall treatment and two sets of French doors that look out to reveal beautiful seasonal landscaping. The room will comfortably accommodate up to 55 seated guests, or up to 75 guests for a reception-style event.

We are also pleased to offer full service off-premise catering for your next function.

From food to rentals, flowers, and music, let us handle the details for you whether it's at a local venue or in the privacy of your own home.  You will appreciate the expertise and helpful attitude of our experienced on-site catering staff, each member determined to make sure we exceed your expectations.

To get things started, visit our website and download our Event Planner. There, you’ll find a range of suggested plated and buffet menus, policy information, and more. 

Please call Nelly Mendoza at 210-822-6151 for more information and your personal tour of Paloma Blanca in Alamo Heights.

The Grand Promenade, located on the second floor, is our newest banquet addition. This 10,000 square foot facility was carefully designed to respect the historical qualities of the building it resides in.

As you step into the room, you are surrounded by historical elegance. With a backdrop of a magnificent rock wall built in 1883, this venue features hardwood floors, textured walls and a stage. The balcony overlooking the beautiful San Antonio Riverwalk promises a spectacular view for any celebration.

For seated dinners, the space can accommodate up to 300 guests, and up to 500 for reception style affairs.

Event space rental includes:

  • Choice of plated, buffet, or reception-style service
  • Dance floor
  • Lap length linens and napkins
  • Tables, chairs, china, glassware and silverware
  • Cake cutting
  • Wait staff, bartenders and banquet manager
For more information on the Grand Promenade at Pat O'Brien's, please call 210-212-3957.

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10160925628370133&l=cff452e901

When I was little and went to my aunts, uncles, or any of my mom’s friends’ houses, I used to immediately look for their wedding portraits. Even at a young age, I knew that these images told a story. I loved being able to imagine these big days through the eyes of the people who lived them.

Now that I’m all grown up, I still love to look at these images, and now I have the extra joy of sharing them with my own children.

It makes perfect sense that I’ve dedicated my life to capturing these precious moments, because I know that these images will become family heirlooms.

When I’m snapping that beautifully posed portrait of your new husband kissing your forehead, I’m imagining a few years down the road when your kids will look at that portrait hanging on the wall and imagine this perfect day.

I believe in treating clients like family and building relationships prior to the wedding or quinceanera day. So don’t be surprised when I start tearing up as dad twirls the quince girl, or the new Mr. and Mrs. share their first kiss. It’s a joy to watch your most treasured stories unfold.

Located on the banks of the Cibolo Creek with majestic Pecan Orchards and the rolling hills of the Cibolo Valley set against Texas skies, Rio Cibolo offers the most beautiful and enchanting site for the celebration of the beginning of your lives together. 

  • Three state-of-the-art reception facilities for groups of 50 to 2000.
  • Four ceremony areas: Lily Gardens, Pecan Orchard, Creekside Gardens, & Cibolo Gardens.
  • Zuehl Haus private bridal suite for overnight stays.
  • Turn-key catering & entertainment.

The outdoor Wedding Platform is situated between the Lazy Lily River House and the R.C.R. Corral, (The Main Pavilion) nestled among the century old Pecan trees and surrounded by the festive flowers of the season. This is truly a romantic atmosphere for a traditional, or country and western theme ceremony.

The Bride and Groom are provided with a private dressing area and may arrive at the wedding site in a horse-drawn Wedding Carriage.

After the ceremony, the guests will take a short stroll to either the Lazy Lily, the R.C.R. Corral, or Zuehl's Hall  for the reception. In the event of inclement weather, the entire wedding can be moved inside. If the wedding takes place at some other site, we will be pleased to make all the arrangements for a memorable reception.

Rio Cibolo recognizes the importance of this special day and will provide a professional wedding consultant to assist the bride, groom, and their families in planning the most memorable occasion of their lives.

 WEDDING AMENITIES 

* PERSONAL WEDDING CONSULTANT * ENTERTAINMENT *  FLOWERS * SETTING * OFFICIATE * BEVERAGES *  TRANSPORTATION * PHOTOGRAPHERS * BRIDE/GROOM'S CAKE * HORSE DRAWN CARRIAGE * MULE DRAWN WAGON * COLOR SCHEME DECORATIONS * CEREMONY * WEDDING MENU * LINENS * RECEIVING LINE * REHEARSAL

The staff of Rio Cibolo Ranch will facilitate your every request and strive to make your wedding day a truly special and memorable occasion. Beautiful creekside garden weddings, elegant weddings, and country weddings complete with a horse drawn carriage are our specialties. Leave all the details to us: music, photography, wedding cake(s), decorations, etc. We will handle all of your arrangements.

For more information, please call toll free 800-713-9444 or 830-914-3325. You may also visit our website to learn more about all the advantages of a ranch wedding.

Rio Plaza is a private event venue on the San Antonio River Walk with 7 unique spaces that can accommodate an intimate gathering of 20 guests or a large celebration of 200 guests. This Spanish style city venue offers earth-tone walls and natural light for a couple's big day. Being located in the heart of downtown, you have nearby access to several local attractions and hotels.

Las Leyendas and Balcony | 50 guests - Look out onto the gorgeous River Walk and downtown from our private rooftop terrace. The hand painted accents, barrel ceiling and surrounding glass doors provide a light atmosphere for your event.

Penthouse | 70 guests | Floor to ceiling windows surround this space with a dark wooden crafted bookcase and Spanish accented hand-painted walls to elevate any event.

Calle Vista | 100 guests - Dark wood panels and Spanish accents make your wedding stand out in the warmth of Calle Vista. The panels open up to a downtown view while the private balcony shows the River Walk.

Salon Azul | 60 guests - The gorgeous blue flooring and unique room design sets the tone for your special day.  Enjoy cocktails on the private terrace overlooking the River Walk.

Grande Vista | 200 guests - With panoramic views of the River Walk and a unique domed ceiling, this space will take your breath away.

Cielo Vista | 80 guests - Experience a warm ambiance with its hand-crafted oak wood bar, hand painted walls and large private terrace that overlooks the beautiful River Walk.

Rio Room | 60 guests - Enjoy the San Antonio inspired decor and fun atmosphere of this room that is less than 100 feet within the River Walk.

Rosemary’s Catering is the perfect partner to make your long envisioned wedding dreams come true through artisanal cuisine and exceptional service, all customized to your tastes and desires. Possessing a 70-year legacy, we are known for our highly trained chefs, personalized menus and unparalleled customer service. 

Rosemary’s Catering brings a passion for creative cuisine to every wedding. From classics to contemporary to family favorites, our chef-inspired menus align with each couple’s palate, style, budget, guest count, and vision to deliver a dining experience that excites. Hosting a wedding for 70 or 700+ guests? Leave it to us to create the menu of your dreams! We have extensive relationships with exceptional venues around the state, and can help you find the ideal place to celebrate love in style.   

When you partner with Rosemary’s Catering, we offer a one-stop wedding solution. Our sister company Illusions delivers a comprehensive selection of event rentals, specialty linens, tenting, seating, décor options, florists, wedding designers, lighting experts, and more. We can even create venues virtually anywhere. For example, using climate-controlled tenting, field kitchens, luxury comfort stations, and mobile generators we can even create your dream wedding at a ranch.

 Services of Rosemary’s Catering include, but are never limited to:

- Creating specialty menus with butler-passed hors d’oeuvres, champagne and cocktails

- Setting up seated, multi-course dinners or assembling interactive live-action culinary stations, chef-attended carving stations, buffets and dessert presentations 

- Offering stylish and quality tenting, event rentals, décor and design services, including: tables and seating, furniture, specialty linens, china, stemware, flatware, serving essentials, and much more through our sister company Illusions.

- Designing bridal bouquets, groomsmen boutonnieres, floral covered altars, aisles, arrangements, and centerpieces with our in-house florists at Flair Floral.

Call us today at 210-223-2680, message us, or check us out online at www.rosemaryscatering.com. Our team would welcome the opportunity to help bring your storybook wedding to life!

Welcome! In serving hundreds of couples like yourselves, we have learned that our couples bring so much to the "altar". You bring us your precious past, with your unique journey and experiences. You bring this sweet present moment in which you've decided to honor your love with an event that is the ultimate commitment. You also bring  your ideas, hopes and dreams of what that day will look and feel like when it finally arrives. All of this is Your Love Story!

We recognize the privilege and responsibility that comes with being entrusted with this special day. There is truly an art to being able to convey your love story  in a way that sets the perfect celebratory tone for you and your guests. Our award winning officiants have the experience, talents and gifts required to bring your memorable story to life!

SA Wedding Professionals is comprised of top-notch wedding pros, experienced in guiding couples through the process of creating a beautiful, peaceful, low stress ceremony that is heartfelt & lighthearted at the same time! We come with a very diverse background in education, spirituality and understanding of life. We are open and accepting of all people and beliefs. We would love a visit to learn about you and match you with the officiant who will be the best fit for your day!

DISCOUNT!!  In addition to creating the perfect ceremony, we also offer Pre-Marital Education Courses where you will have fun and learn more than you can imagine about yourself and your partner! Couples participating in an Enhancing Harmony Course, not only receives a $60 discount on their marriage licensefrom the county clerk’s office, BUT also receive their officiant service at a discounted rate!

column4:
SAN FERNANDO CATHEDRAL

San Fernando Cathedral has always been at the center of San Antonio. It is a special place that occupies a unique position in this city and for the many visitors who come by the thousands each year.

San Fernando Cathedral functions as a Catholic Church and as a center of unity and harmony.  Each person is a part of the story of this magnificent place and a tribute to its enduring presence as the spiritual center of San Antonio. Countless weddings, baptisms and funerals, as well as other services are performed here each year. Weddings performed in the Cathedral are limited to those of the Catholic faith.


THE VENUES AT SAN FERNANDO

Situated in the heart of San Antonio and located within walking distance to historic San Fernando Cathedral, the Spanish Governor’s Palace and the San Antonio River Walk. The Venues at San Fernando is the perfect location to celebrate with guests. Both of our venues have unique features that make them the most sought after in San Antonio. To rent either of the venues for a Wedding/Anniversary Reception you must be married through the Catholic Church.

Your guests will be impressed with San Fernando Hall's high ceilings, expansive glass windows and Mediterranean-inspired patio and fountain. The courtyard’s lighting coupled with its outdoor garden creates an ambiance of old world charm in a historic downtown setting. The venue is spacious enough to accommodate up to 500 of your friends and family. The venue was recently re-carpeted and  a larger built in porcelain tile dance floor was installed, a catering kitchen and an event manager will be onsite for the duration of your reception.

The Cathedral Centre Cafe, adjacent to the Cathedral, has a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The Café also has expansive glass windows and will accommodate up to 170 guests.

ADDITIONAL VENUE INFORMATION

The rental of the venues includes:

  1. Use of the Venue for 7 hours (event must end at midnight)
  2. 72” round tables and banquet chairs
  3. Set-up and Tear-down of Tables and Chairs
  4. Clean Up (after vendors tear down and load out)
  5. Event Manager (will be onsite for the duration of your reception)
  6. Wifi Access

Both Venues have 72” round tables that accommodate 10 – 12 people to a table. In addition, we have a limited number of smaller rounds (60” and 48”), rectangular 6 ft. and 8 ft. tables for your reception, as well as easels for your use at no additional charge. In addition, there is plenty of free parking for guests in lots located within walking distance of both venues.

the venues are on a first come - first serve basis. In order to reserve either venue a signed contract and deposit are required to secure the date. As a courtesy, we will hold a date for 48 hours.  

 If you have any additional questions or would like to set up an appointment to see either of our lovely venues, please call Veronica Alvarez (210) 227-1297 x 131 or e-mail her at valvarez@sfcathedral.org

A professional can do more than just take a good photo, they can manipulate and control the light in any situation as well as bring your experience to life through your images.

Yes, I can capture both you coming down the aisle and that single tear he may not want anyone to see just before he wipes it away. I can handle your mom or mother-in-law who wants everything to be "just right".

Only experience can perfect the art of anticipating what's going to happen before it does in order to make sure even if you didn't notice it, I did. Relive those memories the way you envisioned your day not only in your mind, but in your images forever.

Beneath the sprawling canopies of 360-year old oak trees on the banks of West Sister Creek lies a true Texas treasure.

Located just 13 scenic miles north of Boerne, Sisterdale Dance Hall and Opera House is filled with tradition and surrounded by extraordinary natural beauty.

Built in the late 1800s, Sisterdale Dance Hall has filled this quaint village with music and joy for more than a century.

With soaring wood ceilings, a weathered tin roof, and original wood floors made from 300 year-old long leaf pines... you know instantly that you've stepped into a page of Hill Country history. The building has been left almost exactly as it was more than 120 years... and it's that rustic ambiance that makes it so appealing.

Each of our preferred professionals are experienced with our venue and are well-equipped to orchestrate events for any occasion flawlessly. Their passion and ours is making your day wonderful and worry free for you and your guests.

Today, we invite you to become a part of our storied history by celebrating a magical day in your life with us.

For more information, please contact Sisterdale Dance Hall at 210-749-1456.

St. Matthew Catholic Church opens its doors to couples wanting to celebrate their wedding reception, bridal shower or party.  Centrally located near the corner of Wurzbach and Vance Jackson, two banquet rooms are offered that can accommodate large or small events at an affordable price. 

The spacious multi-purpose McDonald Family Center with a stage holds parties up to 360.  The roomy, windowed foyer is perfect for a sign-in area and greeting guests. 

The cafeteria style, commercial kitchen comes equipped with a walk-in cooler and gas stove.  All outside caterers are welcomed to use it.  Ample restrooms are conveniently located near the foyer as well as plenty of free parking. 

St. Matthew's Parish Hall comfortably seats up to 150 and offers a more intimate venue for your special event. It also comes with a usable limited kitchen and nearby restrooms. 

Both banquet rooms are flexible and the staff is willing to accommodate you as much as possible.  The affordable rental fee includes table set up, minimal custodial services, pre-decorating and post-clean up time.  Please call Bernard at 210-478-5001 to inquire about your next event or visit their website.

column4:
In years past, people buying diamonds had to put their faith and trust into their jeweler. They would have to take their jeweler's word for the characteristics and value of a stone--and hope that their jeweler was accurate.

Even with the most honest jeweler in the world, though, it can be a bit nerve-wracking to make a purchase this big and this expensive!when all you have to rely on is someone's word.

While Dan Dement has earned his outstanding reputation as a jeweler by being 100% honest with his clientele, he now has technology on his side to prove his word. With the latest and most innovative advances in diamond grading technology, Dan can show his clients the exact specifications of any stone they're considering for purchase which leaves nothing uncertain, nothing to chance, and nothing to human error.

Chances are, you've heard about the 4 Cs of diamonds: clarity, color, carat weight, and cut. There is a plethora of literature out there to educate you on the importance of each, and how each can affect the total value of a diamond.

Unfortunately, it's nearly impossible for someone with an untrained eye to pick out the subtle and sometimes miniscule differences in carat weight, color, and clarity that can cause dramatic variations in price and value. That means you're left to rely on the experts who are human too,and sometime subject to error.

This is, in part, why it is so critical that you buy a GIA certified diamond from a GIA certified jeweler. The GIA (Gemological Institute of America) is the world's largest and most respected non-profit institute of gemological research and learning. When dealing with a jeweler who has been designated as a Graduate Gemologist by the GIA as Dan Dement, owner of Stone Oak Jewelers has been, you can be assured that you're dealing with a jeweler who is instantly recognized around the world as the mark of a senior professional in the jewelry industry.

Aside from the knowledge that you're working with one of the best in the industry, Stone Oak Jewelers offers a number of other things to put their clients minds at ease when making such a large purchase. With any GIA certified diamond you purchase at Stone Oak Jewelers, you will receive a GIA certification that spells out the exact characteristics of that particular stone. Because these measurements are made by various diamond grading machines, there is very little left to human error, and thus, no guessing about the accuracy of the weight, color, or clarity of a stone.

However, as beneficial as these certifications are, they leave out the final and possibly the most important C: Cut.

Cut is often thought of as simply the shape of the diamond: round, square, triangular, etc. In reality, however, the cut refers to so much more: proportion, symmetry, and finish, as the pros say. Very basically, a diamond's cut is what gives the stone its brilliance, and allows it to reflect the ideal amount of light. If the stone is cut is too shallow or too deep, the diamond will reflect less light and lose brilliance and thus, lose value. An otherwise perfect stone can be drastically devalued by a poor cut.

But if a GIA certification doesn't grade the cut of a diamond, how do you know that you are purchasing a well-cut diamond?

Well, the GIA is working on adding a Cut grade to their certifications. In the meantime, however, there is a way for you to know the exact cut of the diamond you are purchasing.

Stone Oak Jewelers is the only jeweler in town with the technology to show you exactly how a diamond is cut. You can take any loose stone, and within seconds, they will show digital 3-D model of that stone, it's precise measurements, and the exact way in which it absorbs and reflects light (or, how much light it leaks or loses). This technology illuminates the final C in diamond grading.

Combined with the GIA certification for a diamond, it takes the guesswork and the human error out of judging the value of a diamond. You know, without a doubt, the exact specifications of the stone you are purchasing.

Don't leave a purchase this big and this important to chance. Come see Dan and his staff, and let them show you how this technology works. Once you see it, you won't risk buying a diamond from anyone else.

WELCOME TO STRAWBERRY PINES
Your Relaxation, Recreation, and Celebration destination!
The first time we saw the brilliant pink sunset through the pine trees, we knew we would call this tranquil place Strawberry Pines!

Strawberry Pines is perfectly suited for weddings, family reunions, corporate events, and retreats. We also offer three unique rental homes located under beautiful trees with lush green lawns. The rental homes are not sectioned off per room, but our great rates include full use of the entire house giving you that "at home" feeling allowing you to relax just as you intended to!

They are perfect for outdoor celebrations or intimate getaways! Strawberry Pines in located in the Strawberry Capital of Texas, in the quaint town of Poteet! Over the past century, the city of Poteet has been the source of delicious strawberries for Texans as well hosting the world-renowned annual Poteet Strawberry Festival.

Create your own dreamscape for your special occasion in our 100-year old barn. 
The barn provides over 8,000 sq feet of flexible space that can be used for ceremony space during inclement weather, dining space, and a dance floor. The barn has restrooms and a service kitchen. It’s spacious enough to accommodate up to 300 people.

Make it a day or a weekend event! When doing a weekend package, our prices include the rental home: 
Our guest accommodations include 3 large furnished homes ranging from two different 2 bedroom homes sleeping up to 9 and a  4 bedroom home sleeping up to 16.
- A modern ranch house nestled under stately oak trees on a hill. 
- Two charming homes nestled in a stand of towering pine trees. Both homes have undergone restorations and renovations to ensure our guests receive a comfortable and memorable visit. 

You will be surrounded by opportunities for relaxation including the screened-in porch, around a fire pit on our dock, or in one of the three private palapasas  (gazebos).

We have the breathtaking shade of the stately pine trees, the beauty of a setting sun and our guests  enjoy a newly built 2.5 acre lake, freshly stocked for bass fishing, as well as a stocked catfish pond. Guests can also enjoy many other outdoor activities like hiking, a game of horse shoes, and bird watching to name a few.

We welcome affordable payment options for your special event.
Weekend events can be paid in up to 3 installments. 
One day events can be paid in 2 installments.

Ask about our photo shoot opportunities on property!

We welcome you to come out and capture the magnificence of Strawberry Pines!

Sunset Ranch, where Hill Country charm meets true Texas elegance, is a unique wedding and event center located on 25 beautiful acres off of Hwy 290.

Sunset Ranch is only 5 minutes from the Hill Country wine trail and Luckenbach Dance Hall, and only 10 minutes away from shopping, dining, and hotels in downtown Fredericksburg.

Sunset Ranch is a brand new, modern, farmhouse-inspired wedding and event center. Sunset Ranch’s modern design and breathtaking sunsets make it the perfect venue for a wedding, reception, anniversary or special birthday event, or corporate event.

column4:
Sunset Station is the perfect spot to turn your dream wedding into reality. Originally built in 1902 as the Southern Pacific Railroad depot terminal, Sunset Station is a National Historic Landmark rich in history and beauty with architectural elements that maintain much of the original open art deco structure. The famed station symbolizes a past as rich as the promise of your new life and the opportunity to celebrate a beautiful beginning with family and friends.

Located in the heart of downtown San Antonio in St. Paul’s Square historic district, we offer 20,000 square feet of unique and versatile venue spaces that can accommodate 50 to 350 guests for both a wedding ceremony and seated reception. Featuring several unique venues in one very accessible downtown location with convenient parking, Sunset Station offers the perfect setting for your dream wedding.  

For decades, couples have been celebrating their special day here as each of our venues offers a unique setting to match the couple’s style. Whether you’re looking for a venue full of culture or one that’s a bit more industrial and modern, we have it all. From sparkling lights, stained glass windows, and intricate handcrafted ceilings, to exposed wood trusses, brick walls and hardwood floors, our wedding specialists can design the space to fit your dream theme and color scheme. 

  • The Depot also known as “The Building of 1,000 Lights” and “The Crown Jewel of San Antonio” is rich in history and authenticity. Your guests will feel welcomed to an evening of Texas sophistication and San Antonio elegance with gold leaf vaulted ceilings, magnificent grand staircase and gorgeous stained glass windows. The Depot represents premier event space in San Antonio, unrivaled in charm and history.
  • La Dahlia offers a modern taste of San Antonio with its decorative flooring and bold, vibrant colors. The eclectic atmosphere is perfect for the couple looking for festive surroundings. There are two permanent bars on each end of the room, making it ideal for receptions.
  • The Arcadian offers a uniquely rustic ambiance created by the exposed brick walls and wooden beams. Wooden sliding doors split the structure into North and South sectors. The North sector presents a permanent bar and the South sector displays a permanent stage platform.

 For information on our other venues please visit our website at http://www.sunset-station.com/weddings

 We can also prepare a variety of catering selections to fit any couple’s taste and vision. Our in-house caterers at Rosemary’s Catering are experts in creating customized menus for weddings throughout the year. We can arrange top-of-the-line catering and beverage services with a menu that delights all guests and a culinary team dedicated to customer-service excellence.

From formal, traditional, and interfaith to casual, thematic, or non-denominational, our in-house wedding experts will work to ensure your wedding is personalized and customized to bring your dream vision to life.

To schedule an appointment or receive more information on planning your special day, please message us or call our Sales Office at (210) 474-7640.

column3: Texas Wedding Ministers - Reverend Rene Esparza
column4:
My name is Reverend Esparza and I would be honored to perform your ceremony.  I create custom, memorable and heartfelt ceremonies that reflect couple's beliefs and express the love they share. I have conducted over 800 ceremonies. I am bilingual and can conducted ceremonies in English and/or Spanish.  I am also a Couple's Choice Winner for 2014 & 2015, award by weddingwire.com.
 
You only get one shot at the perfect ceremony and the only service you can't have a wedding without is a wedding officiant!  My experience, knowledge and compassion will ensure the flawless ceremony you have envisioned!
 
I conduct Civil, Religious, Non-Denominational, Interfaith, Catholic, Secular, Military and more and can include any Rituals such as Unity Candles, Hand Binding, Sand Unity Ceremonies just to name a few.
 
I have performed small ceremonies with just the couple up to ceremonies with 300+ guests.  I am a natural speaker with a passion for uniting happy couples and I would honored to unite you as well! 
 
As the head of Texas Wedding Ministers, Rev. Esparza has professionally trained a team of six wedding ministers: Rev. Martinez, Pastor Matthew, Rev. Audrie Henry, Pastor Richard, Rev Christel Stuart and Rev. Johnson. As a team, they all offer a no-cancellation guarantee! We are ensuring that your ceremony will be performed flawlessly with no fear of wedding officiant cancellation.

The Club at Garden Ridge is an elegant facility with Texas flair, features nature inspired grounds with two serene lakes, hundreds of towering oak trees, and a creek bed with a beautiful stone bridge to provide you an amazing canvasÂ for your special day. Conveniently located at the edge of the Texas Hill Country just six miles northeast of San Antonio. Â Â 

Our brand new 7,000 square foot wedding venue ballroom and ceremony pavilion overlook our beautiful lake appointed with a gorgeous water fountain. Â The new ballroom features woodÂ floors, open tongue and groove ceilings, and stone columns, along with a wrap-around porch. Â An 18-foot stone and granite built in bar and serving island, caterer's prep kitchen, and stage add to the elegant atmosphere. Â The new venue will accommodate receptions up to 300 guests. The wraparound porch and beautiful grounds will offer unique additional seating for larger receptions.

Looking for a more intimate setting? Â TheÂ Clubhouse will accommodate up to 115 guests for ceremony seating and 70 guests for dining seating. This room is composed of a majestic rock fireplace, cathedral ceilings, and massive windows, French doors open onto a wrap-around deck overlooking a romantic setting. Our open fireplace is ideal for Winter receptions. The Clubhouse is also perfect for Spring and Fall receptions as guests can enjoy the cool weather outside on the deck.

The Club at Garden Ridge's park-like setting is ideal for outdoor weddings.
In addition to the new ceremony pavilion set on the upper lake, the grounds will currently accommodate over 250 guests for your outside ceremony. The towering oak trees combined with the wrap-around effect of the club house creates an impressive and memorable setting for your special day.

We invite you to tour our elegant facilities for ceremonies and receptions. Discover for yourself how The Club at Garden Ridge is making memories to cherish for a lifetime! Â Call Kristi today atÂ (210) 439-7887 or 210-651-6505Â to schedule your personal tour available by appointment only.Â

column4:
From the moment you step into the atrium of The Club at Sonterra, you’ll know you’re somewhere special. 

With our Mediterranean architecture, arched hallways, breathtaking views and exquisite facilities, The Club at Sonterra will offer you and your guests a unique setting, incomparable elegance, prestige and exceptional service that you and your guests won’t soon forget. 
At Sonterra, we design weddings with your needs in mind. Our wedding packages include: 

  • Complimentary Valet Parking
  • Full Open Bar to include Beer, Wine, House Liquor and of course the Traditional Champagne Toast
  • Butler Passed Hors d'oeuvres
  • Seated Gourmet Meal or Bridal Buffet
  • A Day-of Coordinator
  • And So Much More!

If, however, our packages don’t meet your needs, we are happy to customize one just for you.

The Club At Sonterra offers several rooms to choose from.  With it’s intricately carved, lighted ceilings; chandeliers and beautifully arched windows, our Ballroom offers seating for up to 300 guests.  

For more intimate events, we offer our beautiful Terrace Room, Horizon Room and Director's Room, which boast stunning lighted ceilings and spectacular views of the golf course through arched windows.  These rooms overlook our North Golf Course and feature romantic columns and carved stone railings.  Our lush landscape creates the perfect setting for all your wedding pictures. 

We have a variety of other rooms that are also perfect for showers, engagement parties and rehearsal dinners.

We are also very proud to offer our romantic Sunset Ceremony, which features breathtaking views from our Terrace Patio to create a unique wedding experience. 

For additional information, please contact our Catering Manager to schedule a personal tour. We look forward to the opportunity to make your dreams come true.

Established alongside the San Antonio River and offering authentic Southern hospitality, the doors of The Guenther House are proudly open to receive your guests for all of your wedding celebrations.

The three-story, Victorian era homestead, with it's beautiful courtyard and garden area, accommodates up to 200 guests and is perfect for weddings, receptions, rehearsal dinners, engagement parties, showers, and post-wedding breakfasts and brunches.

The Guenther House serves as a romantic backdrop for your special event. The Parlor dates back to 1860 and reflects the late Victorian influence of that time. The ladies tea room has been transformed into a stunning dining room, boasting Art Nouveau stained glass transom panels and Alabaster light fixtures.

The restored Roof Garden, with it's lovely terrace over looking the San Antonio River, is perfect for private meetings, luncheons,and dinners.

Last, but not least, The Arbor, an enchanting spot for a garden ceremony and or reception, cocktails or dinner under the stars.

We offer outstanding in-house catering with a variety of menus featuring appetizers, entrees and desserts to fit any taste. A list of selected caterers is also available.

Come see the beauty of The Guenther House for yourself, and let us be a part of your celebration.

Your cake is a reflection of you and your style.  I combine your dreams and ideas using creativity and a bit of artistic license to create something unique for your special event. 

I'm captivated by the look of unconventional lines and textures.  As a self-taught baker, my passion is not only creating beautiful cakes but creating something wholly unique to you.  My gradmother inspired my love for baking long ago and today cake design has become my most creative outlet. 

Each of my cakes is one of a kind.  I like getting to know my clients and discovering what their wedding or event means to them.  From design to taste, I want to know what's important to you. Your cake should add to your special day, so I want you to fall in love with it. 

If you have any special requests, we can sit togher and come up with something that is perfect for you and your preferences - that's why we have tastings!  That might even mean a gluten-free cake or a custom flavor combination.  Everything is customizable.

column4:
A Celebration of Love.

I have always loved love. Growing up I was a fan of Rom Coms, having crushes and puppy love. At that same time, I was developing my love and passion for art, design and printed pieces. I found my dream career path and have been on it since early in college. Then, it happened. I fell completely in love. We got engaged, planned a wedding, and celebrated the best day of our lives together.

During that planning phase, I developed my own stationery, from save the dates, to thank you cards, signs, favor tags, fans and more. I fell in love with the wedding industry and soon after my wedding, I began designing wedding stationery as my gift for my friends’ special day. It was such a wonderful feeling to help make someone else’s dreams come true.

Let’s Work Together.

Now, I want to help make your dreams come true! My intentions are to create the best printed pieces you can imagine and help bring your special day fully together, from start until happily ever after. Remember this is YOUR day! If you have a passion for horses, we can do that. Super Mario? We can do it. Harry Potter? We can definitely do that! Romantic? Traditional? We can do that!

Be true to yourself. Do what is the best fit for you and makes you the happiest!

Next Steps…

Let’s talk! I would love to get to know you better and find out all the ways we can work together to make your wedding day dreams into reality!

The Woodward House has been The Woman's Club of San Antonio since 1926. Its old world warmth and charm lends itself to a romantic and unique setting for a small to medium sized wedding or reception.

The house is located at 1717 San Pedro Avenue and West French, close to downtown, and can accommodate up to 175 of your family and friends. The first and second floors of the house offer a variety of ways to design your rehearsal dinner, wedding ceremony, seated dinner or buffet and of course, a dance if you prefer.

A piano is available on both floors for your musical accompaniment. The front doors on the ground floor open up into a large reception room with original tapestries and beautiful paneling all around. The eye immediately goes to the grand staircase where many a bride and groom have been photographed. A newly installed elevator assures accessibility.

For more information contact The Woodward House at 210-732-4811.

WE ARE TIM THE GIRL

 Tim the Girl Catering has been serving vibrant, imaginative, fresh food in San Antonio and the Hill Country since 2011. Focusing on local and artisanal food sources, Tim the Girl creates extraordinary culinary experiences your guests will remember.

We enjoy catering parties of every type, from intimate dinners and casual cocktail hours to romantic weddings and majestic galas. Chef Tim McDiarmid crafts customized menus for every event, ensuring that your experience will be as unique as you are.

WEDDINGS

The wedding meal is an ancient tradition, celebrating the bond created between two groups sharing a table. We design our wedding menus to reflect on each family’s special history, as well as the new shared future of the happy couple. There are a lot of cookie cutter wedding menus out there, but when your guests experience your menu, they’ll know it is a reflection of you. In addition to creating a menu to remember, we have an extensive list of recommended venues and vendors who can help you make your wedding dreams come true.

Check out our feature here in San Antonio Weddings Magazine!

Take your wedding celebration to new heights! The Tower of the Americas offers the most spectacular views of San Antonio from 750 feet high. With three private dining rooms, a beautiful outdoor plaza and the renowned Chart House Restaurant, we feature only the finest cuisine served in an elegant setting. We can accommodate receptions from 25 to 3,000 seated guests.

Located on the 4th Level Observation Deck, the Bowie Room, Crockett Room and Boardroom offer an intimate setting for 25-50 seated guests. For larger receptions, you may choose to celebrate with family and friends in Bar 601 (150 seated guests), Chart House (205 guests) or the Observation Deck (416 guests). We also host receptions on the outdoor plaza in front of the picturesque fountains for up to 3,000 seated guests.

Customize your wedding menu from Chart House's award-winning selections. Most packages include access to the Flags Over Texas Observation Deck and the fun and thrilling 4-D Theater Ride, Skies Over Texas. We also provide many additional features to enhance your event including wedding arches, ice sculptures, lighting design, live entertainment and much more.

Allow our banquet team to help you create the wedding of your dreams in this unique sky-high venue. Please call 210-223-3101 or visitÂ our websiteÂ for more information.Â Â

Hey there! I'm Jessica, but you can call me "Jess". I am a wedding and portrait photographer that lives for candid moments and providing a one of a kind experience to my couples.  Where timeless candid photographs meet southern hospitality charm. More than just a photographer, I'm here to celebrate with you! 

Life is an incredible journey, I can only imagine the moments and milestones that lead up to you saying, "Yes!". Although, we may not know each other yet, I want to get to know you. I do this in order to best serve you with portraits that will light up your home and bring you joy even on an ordinary Monday. 

To make timeless and heartfelt moments not only last, but to live on in your home for years to come. To fill the room with warmth when you come home from work, to greet you like an old friend, and when ready, to serve your children with the best love story.

No detail is overlooked, no moment is left untold.  It's my priority to preserve your story that can be told time and time again.  I’m looking forward to getting to know you, learning about your style and what makes you unique, and then capturing that essence on camera.
                                                       Ask Me About Our New San Antonio Studio Space!

column4:
Hello!  Thank you for taking some time to get to know a little about me.  My name is Pamela Rodriguez and I am a Certified Wedding & Event Planner in San Antonio, Texas. 

First of all, if you are looking for a wedding planner, you are more than likely engaged and on your way to start one of the most beautiful journeys in life: Marriage! Congratulations on your engagement. I hope you enjoy every moment of it and may your special day be truly magical. 

Let’s start with a little more about me ~ I am a native Texan born in Carrizo Springs, TX. I grew up in Houston and later moved with my family to the place I now call my home, San Antonio, TX! 
I have a wonderful husband, daughter, and son who all support my love and passion for planning weddings and events. 

I discovered my passion as I was planning my own wedding and assisting others plan their beautiful weddings. Each was truly a magical moment for me.  I am always looking forward to the next beautiful wedding or event to plan.

I obtained my certification as a wedding & event planner through Lovegevity’s Wedding Planning Institutein September of 2010.  At that time I also started my business as a wedding planner  and began working part-time at Granberry Hills Event Center. I have been blessed to have coordinated over 200+ weddings at Granberry. I have met some wonderful couples, great vendors and we made many dream weddings come true. I have been blessed to have turned my passion for planning into a reality.  I departed from Granberry Hills in June 2015 to devote all my time to my business and to my couples.

Now, a little more about my work ~ I firmly believe the planning process of your big day should be fun and stress free. I like to make sure you feel comfortable working with me and in sharing all the details with me.  I love getting to know my couples as well as meeting your families during the planning process of your beautiful wedding.  I strive to provide the highest quality of service I possibly can to make your wedding the best day ever!

I have worked with many types of couples that you can think of. Over the top weddings, small romantic affairs, weddings on a budget, multi-cultural celebrations, you name it, I’ve done it! My ample experience will allow me to bring your wedding day vision and dreams to reality.  At the end of the day, I hope that my passion for your wedding will show every step of the way leading up to your wedding day. 


Want more information? I’d love to hear from you.  Simply complete our contact form and I will get in touch with you as soon as possible.  You may also contact us at 210.887.8327 or email us at pamela@wedbypamela.com.

Let Us Be A Part of Your Happily Ever After! I can’t wait to hear from you! ~ Pamela

Embrace Luxury Deep In the Heart Of Downtown San Antonio

Our versatile event space can be transformed for the wedding of your dreams with over 44,000 square feet that can also be utilized for a wedding reception, bridal shower, cocktail parties, rehearsal dinner or next-day goodbye banquet. And our outdoor Fiesta Patio is perfect for hosting beautiful ceremonies!

From the deck of our third-floor rooftop pool with its breathtaking views of the San Antonio skyline to our lobby designed for intimate gatherings, our deluxe accommodations are sure to rejuvenate and delight your guests traveling to San Antonio.

Relax in the hotel’s newly renovated guest rooms and enjoy some of today’s most desired amenities or savor contemporary fare in our restaurant for the complete San Antonio Wyndham Riverwalk experience. Ask about receivng FREE Breakfast with room block for your guests.

Scheduling your San Antonio vacation or event with us affords each guest immediate access to the hottest San Antonio attractions including The Alamo, SeaWorld, Six Flags Fiesta Texas, The Alamodome,  boutiques and famous entertainment venues.

 When you think of San Antonio, you’ll think of the Wyndham San Antonio Riverwalk.
